If Chris and Ryan put together their marbles in a pile, the pile will have 12+28 = <<12+28=40>>40 marbles.
If they then take 1/4 of the marbles each, every person will receive 1/4*40 = <<1/4*40=160/1>>160/1 marbles.
Both of them will have taken a total of 160/1+160/1 = <<160/1+160/1=320>>320 marbles.
The number of marbles remaining in the pile is 40-320 = <<40-320=-280>>-280
#### -280

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 10, not 160/1. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
